Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS>Our spy duty is over for today! We'll be
doing it again tomorrow. Are you coming
along too, number three?<sp:0:4:0>You don't have to decide right now! Just
meet us at the school in the morning, OK?
Talk_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>We're spies for A-Zoom! <sp:5:0:0>He's a hero who
protects our village.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>I'm, ummm, spy number one, and my little
sister, Narah, is spy number two.<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_00>That makes you spy number three, mister!
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Your weapon is really neat! <sp:5:0:0>Every
wanderer has amazing gear. <sp:5:0:0>It's true!<sp:0:4:0><snd:LaughS_01>I love swords and bows and arrows and
all that stuff. <sp:5:0:0>Wanna be my friend, mister?
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0301>Wait... <sp:5:0:0>How come you don't have
a weapon?<sp:0:4:0>What's the point of a traveler if he doesn't
have a cool weapon to show me?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_01>You're boring, mister. But that's OK!
I can fix that!
Talk_25:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>Awww...<sp:5:0:0>there was no evildoer? <sp:5:1:0>I really
wanted to beat up a bad guy.
Talk_26:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>Oh...it's just spy number three. I thought
it was my chance to beat up a bad guy.
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:SurpriseM_01>Oh! Hey, mister. Are you what they call
a traveler?!
Talk_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting_01>Hey, spy number three. Everything going
OK with your mission?
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>I'm going on spy patrol now. We always
meet up at school first!<sp:0:4:0>If you don't know where the school is,
follow us and we'll show you!
Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting_01>Hey, spy number three. Are you on night
patrol? That's so cool!
Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>Hey, spy number three.<sp:0:4:0>A real spy is at his best in the rain!
The sound of the raindrops covers your
footsteps for extra stealth!
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>We're on spy patrol right now! Wanna join
us, number three?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_01>Our patrol route starts at school and
then passes through the inn.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101>We circle around <clr:0000>Hateno Pasture<clr:ffff> at the
top of the hill, and then head to school
again down the road to the back!
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Come on, number three! An absentminded
spy is no good to us!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>Watch! I'm so stealthy, no one can see!
Gonna check out the school and
<clr:0000>Hateno Pasture<clr:ffff> on the hill!
Talk_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS>Being a spy is fun, but I don't mind
some rain as long as I still get to see
the classroom!
Talk_19:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:TalkPositive>Maybe today I'll spy around <clr:0000>Hateno Pasture<clr:ffff>...<sp:0:4:0>It would be cooler to go to the <clr:0000>lab<clr:ffff> at the top of the
hill, but that's kinda far. I don't know if Narah could
make it all the way.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>The basic job of a spy is to watch for
stuff and report back with Sir Vaylence.<sp:0:4:0>But I dunno who that is, so I usually
just check in with A-Zoom instead.
